Task: Following customer portals and uploading relevant information.
Providing communication with customers.
Preparing offers for RFQ projects.
Managing the commercial part of changes in NPI and serial projects.
Projects: G70 Rearlamp (BMW) – AC236 Rearlamp (MBAG)
–W206 Rearlamp (MBAG) – AC238Mopf Rearlamp(MBAG)
– Atego Headlamp (DAG) –W177&X247 Rearlamp (MBAG)
21/03/2018 – 01/06/2019
Odelo A.Ş Department of Process Engineering
Title: Assembly Engineer
Task: Calculating the cost of the assembly line for RFQ projects and submitting
it to the sales department.
To give the design approval of the machines to be used in the assembly line then
tracking their production and start-up.
Projects: 405B,290B Headlamp & Rearlamp (Toyota) – Clio BJA Rearlamp
(Renault) – NEO Rearlamp (VW)
01/09/2016 – 15/03/2017
EFEMET METAL MACHINING INDUSTRY AND TRADE CO.LTD.
Works in cutting tools, tool holders and component clamping systems
Title: Project Sales Engineer
Task: Maintain contacts with the engineers of the corporate portfolio.
Evaluate the demands by making meetings and to produce common solutions to
the problems.
For further information please contact Jan Johnston on 01695 570 696 or email janj@johnston-vere.co.uk
